title: Microwave Optical Terminal
explain: GJT-50M40G (T/R) microwave optical terminal realizelong distance transmission of microwave signal in 50MHz ~ 40GHz band through optical fiber. Microwave signal is converted into optical signal by GJT-50M40G(T) microwave optical terminal (fore-end), optical signal is thentransmittedto GJT-50M40G(R) microwave optical terminal (rear-end) through optical fiber, and the optical signal is converted into microwave signal, this microwave signal is presented to user equipment through HF cable. Meanwhile GJT-50M40G(R) can be managed through the Ethernet switch,The network management server shall manage the status of all the GJT-50M40G(R) in the network.
features:
Features

  • Management of optical terminalthroughEthernet
  • Management of optical terminalthrough RS-232
  • Display and set up IP of optical module
  • Display optical power of optical module
  • Light adaptation
  • Read and set up the gain of optical terminal
  • Display status of power of optical module

APPLICATIONS

  • Satellite Signals Transmission
  • Remote sensing Signals Transmission
  • Fiber Optic Delay
  • Photonic Processing Of Microwave Signals
  • Microwave Optical Terminal（Fore-end）Microwave Optical Terminal（Rear-end）
